TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. All your things are now very clean and shiny.

I wish to keep being calm.

Ok, keep calm and think of something else to put on one of those "Keep Calm and ____" signs.

I wish I could have this truck in ETS2 (Except different paint and left-hand steering)

Granted. But as its left-hand steering doesn't work, you have to steer by the right hand with a ski pole stuck out from the window.

I wish the e-map which is showing the taxi route isn't lying.

Granted. It gets up and runs around like crazy.

I wish a birthday wish came true.

Granted! It's your birthday everyday. You can only eat PINK frosting for the rest of your life.

I wish that I had more time to write my platformer on scratch...

Granted.
You are standing at the blackboard and writing:
"My platformer on scratch.
My platformer on scratch.
My platformer on scratch.
My platformer on scratch.
My platformer on scratch.
My platformer on scratch.
...."

 

I wish I had a desktop in my schoolhood.

Granted. But you can't get your head through regular doors when wearing your hoodie.

I wish to remember what I have learned.

Granted, but you can’t remember what you got up to do.

I wish you would give me some candy
I wish I could eat sugary treats.

Ight, but only the mango flavored ones.

 

I wish beans wpuld stop hitting me from nowhere.
If that’s impossible, I want my good vision back.

Granted. Your vision is 1000K pixels. Your brain overloads and explodes.

I wish western Canada had decent passenger rail service.

Granted. A passenger rail service is founded. Now you need the rails and the trams.

I wish there were space jelly-fishes,

Granted. But they're so big that when one of them hits the earth, entire countries are wiped out.

 

 

 

I wish that Finland would not be wiped out by them.

Granted. It's too cold in Finland, so the jelly-fishes freeze into icicle-fishes.

I wish for a rain train.

You get hit by a train made of water.

I wish for a stock life support in KSP 2...

Granted. Now a stock Life mini-game is available in menu.

I wish also for kerbilliard.

An unexpected global warming happened.

As Finland appears to be morstly warm, the spring comes, and the jelly-icicle-fishes are now jelly-fishes playing in a green comfy swamp.

I wish the jelly-fishes can climb the trees and fly from branch to branch.

Granted. They quickly destroy the ecosystem and turn the earth into fallout 3.

I wish for something safe.

Granted. You are a Titanic passenger, and you just have found a life jacket.

I wish BepiColombo was orbiting around Mercury right now, and when it has finished filming,  it can continue flying between the planetary orbits.

Granted. The altitude of the orbit around Mercury is [INSERT AMOUNT OF DISTANCE WHICH IS ONE METER SHORTER THAN THE HIGHEST POINT OF MERCURY]

 

 

 

I wish your wish came true.

Granted. It did but you all missed it.

I wish for an offroad rally course in KSP where we could do time trials and try to beat each others times.

It's-a me, Chris Pratt-Kerman!

 

I wish for a funnierest joke.
You must grant the previous for your wish to be granted.
@HarvesteR  gets revived and makes the award winning Kerbal Kart, starring Chris Kratt-Kerman.

He is not dead, he is making Balsa.

Granted. You are Donald Trump's hair.

I wish more at front and less up nose.
